name: PostgREST
description: RESTful API for any PostgreSQL database.

BUILDPACK_URL.description: Heroku buildpack for deploying Haskell applications

DB_SCHEMA.description: The database schema to expose to REST clients. Tables, views and stored procedures in this schema will get API endpoints

DB_ANON_ROLE.description: The database role to use when executing commands on behalf of unauthenticated clients

DB_POOL.description: Number of connections to keep open in PostgRESTâ€™s database pool

SERVER_PROXY_URI.description: Overrides the base URL used within the OpenAPI self-documentation hosted at the API root path

JWT_SECRET.description: The secret used to decode JWT tokens clients provide for authentication

SECRET_IS_BASE64.description: When this is set to true, the value derived from jwt-secret will be treated as a base64 encoded secret

JWT_AUD.description: The audience that should be validated if the JWT token contains an aud claim

MAX_ROWS.description: A hard limit to the number of rows PostgREST will fetch from a view, table, or stored procedure

PRE_REQUEST.description: A schema-qualified stored procedure name to call right after switching roles for a client request
